Author: RedditRabbitt
Text: Just go home! I had this problem the other day but didn’t take laxatives or anything. I just said “the curry didn’t agree with me!” Thought it was cuter than saying I might shit myself haha! I told my coworkers I was gonna burn some incense in the bathroom and I was out!

Author: fishonthesun
Text: I'm so sorry )-: if you start gettin the uh, effects, during your shift, it should be okay to tell your boss you need to go home. If they ask why, say it may be tmi but if they really wanna know you'll tell them, and if they ask you to, just be blunt and be like "I've got diarrhea and if it's a stomach bug I dont want anyone else to get it"
